title: (x) "E-mail Brain" Web 2.0-style geometric sans - House Chalet {Ignacio}
content:
Hey all, I've got a font I'm trying to id, I'm designing a website for a client and all I've received logo wise is the attached jpg. I'm trying to recreate the logo so any help identifying the font would be oh so helpful.

TIA!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [emailbrain\_3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120213232342/http:/typophile.com/files/emailbrain_3.jpg) | 14.9 KB |
author: popstalin

comments.content:
Nope, not quite Chalet. I tried that at first but the "l," "e" and "i" are different.

Thanks though. I may just have to modify Chalet to suite my needs.
It's a mix of Chalet London Eighty and Seventy.
